Always use serena mcp to understand the codebase structure before any changes.
Never create Compatibility layers, always remove legacy code and use new fresh code.
Never use hardcoded string in the code,use contant var or Enums.
Always follow the naming conventions defined in the project.
Always write TDD in BDD manner
Always follow c++ best pracitices.
Never use Magic Numbers, use named constants or Enums instead.
